title: Mrs. Chatterjee vs Norway
writer: Ashima Chibber, Rahul Handa, Sameer Satija
short_cast: Rani Mukerji, Jim Sarbh, Anirban Bhattacharya, Bodhisattwa Majumdar, Saswati Guhatakurtha, Soumya Mukherjee, Balaji Gauri, Yuvaan Vanvari
cast: Rani Mukerji, Jim Sarbh, Anirban Bhattacharya, Bodhisattwa Majumdar, Saswati Guhatakurtha, Soumya Mukherjee, Balaji Gauri, Yuvaan Vanvari
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: An immigrant mother from India embarks on a fierce custody battle when Norwegian authorities take her children away from her. Based on a true story.
